de.vdheide.mp3
Class TextFrame

java.lang.Object
  de.vdheide.mp3.TextFrame
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextFrameEncoding, TextFrameNoEncoding
public abstract class TextFrame
extends java.lang.Object

Used for text ID3v2 frames. Supports get and set operations
